Learners complete a minimum of 40 practice role plays and compete in the RNMKRS sales competition, which is a 15 minute, voice-driven, sales meeting role play with an artificially intelligent customer bot. Participation measures the knowledge and skill in the components of the sales process (develop rapport, discover needs, presenting the product, overcoming objections, and summarizing & closing).
Learners successfully reach the Top Floor in RNMKRS SpeedSell with their elevator pitch.

Learners complete a blended learning experience consisting of 17 on-demand courses and 4 virtual live sessions, totaling over 15 hours. Topics include: Sales Careers, Technology Fundamentals, and Sales Fundamentals.
